Black text on pink: ‚ÄúWhether it's selfish to want to have children, selfish to not want to have children, I hope more women become selfish for themselves. Because we deserve to have the right to choose what we want to do with our lives.‚Äù - Liz

Black text on pink: ‚ÄúI will be so bold and provocative as to say that I believe the decision to have children is very selfish. Maybe the reasons behind it are good, but it is still a selfish decision. And I challenge anyone who says that it's not.‚Äù - Marie
